article.headline: Colgate 65, Dartmouth 64 (2OT)
article.story: HAMILTON, N.Y. (AP) -- Jon Simon scored 16 points and made a 16-foot jumper with less than a second left in double overtime to give Colgate a 65-64 win over Dartmouth Tuesday night. Alvin Reed, Kyle Chones and Kyle Roemer each scored 11 points for the Raiders (3-3). Leon Pettman led the Big Green (1-2) with 20 points and Mike Lang added 14. Neither team shot well throughout, but Colgate led 24-21 at halftime and maintained that lead for most of the second half. Chuck Flynn made a layup off an inbounds pass with 1.2 seconds remaining in regulation to force the first overtime. Roemer made a deep 3-pointer with 17.8 seconds left in overtime to force the second extra session. Dartmouth led in the second overtime until Roemer made a runner with 15 seconds left to put Colgate up 63-62. Pettman answered with a layup to give the Big Green the lead again with seven seconds left, setting the stage for Simon's winning shot. Colgate shot 37 percent to Dartmouth's 38.5 percent. The Big Green are 0-8 at Colgate since 1935.
